title: Sounds goes in and out intermittently on calls so people canâ€™t hear me the entire time.
content:
When I am on phone calls, the sound goes in and out intermittently so others can hear me the entire time.

I have tried the following:

Turned off Bluetooth.
Closed all apps.
Restarted phone.
Checked hardware.
Updated to latest version.
Checked microphones.
Removed recently downloaded apps.
